name: City Run 2 - Rush Hour
description:
City Run 2 New game with new advanture
Help the kids to escape from Gard
Run as fast as you can move left/right slide jump to avoid the obstacles and the traffic

- Cars,Vans !
- Colorful and vivid HD graphics!
- Hoverboard Surfing!
- Paint powered jetpack!
- Lightning fast swipe acrobatics!
- Challenge your friends on Facebook!
